# About
<br>
* Beth is a trained zooplankton taxonomist, specializing in Laurentian Great Lakes Cladocera.
<br>
* She has 8 years of experience working with Great Lakes zooplankton.
<br>
* She has sailed on all 5 Laurentian Great Lakes.
